tool_description: Extracts and structures key information from job postings including required skills, qualifications, responsibilities, and company details.

job_posting_text.description: The complete text content of the job posting or job description

company_name.description: Name of the hiring company if not clear from job posting

error_messages: Empty job posting: Provide a job posting with at least 100 characters of meaningful content.
Unstructured content: The job posting appears to lack standard sections like responsibilities or requirements.
Invalid text format: Ensure the job posting is plain text without corrupted encoding.
usage: Input the complete job posting text to extract structured information about requirements, skills, and company details for targeted application optimization.

job_title.description: The position title extracted from the job posting

required_skills.description: List of technical and soft skills explicitly mentioned as requirements

preferred_qualifications.description: Educational background, certifications, and experience levels mentioned

key_responsibilities.description: Primary job duties and responsibilities listed

company_info.description: Company name, industry, and culture information extracted

keywords.description: Important keywords and phrases for ATS optimization
